overview: After the victory of K-Nil against Rugaur, a mysterious man and his henchman are searching for the slaughter's survivors. In great despair, K-Nil will meet a farmer who will give him a new hope, whereas Elya is sold to slavery and Rugaur gets tortured in prison. "Interlude" is the sequel to Birth of a Hero's "Prelude" first short movie.
title: Birth of a Hero Interlude
